summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, dated July 27, 2019, scheduling a pretrial conference for Jeffrey Epstein on July 31 and noting a meeting between the prosecution and defense teams on August 2 to discuss a defense proposal.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the scheduled pretrial conference on July 31, 2019.

events.title: Epstein Pretrial Conference
events.description: A pretrial conference in the case against Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for 11 a.m.

events.title: Prosecution-Defense Meeting
events.description: The prosecution team (Epstein team) was scheduled to meet with defense attorneys in the afternoon to discuss a proposal from the defense.

keyFacts: A pretrial conference in the Jeffrey Epstein case was scheduled for July 31, 2019, at 11 a.m.
The prosecution and defense teams were scheduled to meet on August 2, 2019, to discuss a proposal from the defense.
The email is internal correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating active case management shortly before Epstein's death.
